[
    ShortEcho {
        span: Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
        values: [
            LiteralString {
                span: Span(
                    1,
                    5,
                ),
                value: "<?php\n",
            },
        ],
    },
    InlineHtml(
        "\nsome html\n",
    ),
    If {
        condition: Variable(
            SimpleVariable(
                SimpleVariable {
                    span: Span(
                        4,
                        9,
                    ),
                    name: "d",
                },
            ),
        ),
        then: [
            Echo {
                values: [
                    LiteralString {
                        span: Span(
                            5,
                            14,
                        ),
                        value: "// ",
                    },
                ],
            },
        ],
        else_ifs: [],
        else: None,
    },
    InlineHtml(
        "\n",
    ),
]
